name: Green Trade Project Office
description:
Green Trade Project Office (GTPO), supervised by the Bureau of Foreign Trade, Ministry of Economic Affairs, Taiwan, is a non-profit organization and a think tank of researchers and experts in economics, environment, and international green policy, aiming to make the world a better place by facilitating global green trade with high-quality green products and innovated technology from Taiwan.

Taiwan has been the main suppliers of electronic and high-tech products for the global supplier chain. Therefore, one of GTPO’s missions is to elevate the quality and the greenness of exported products, providing local manufacturers guidance to advance or supporting them with green technology and green marks application.

GTPO also serves as the main portal to quality green products from Taiwan. Both online and paperback eco-product lists are available for sourcing. Business events, meetings and exhibitions etc., are also available, hoped to help global buyers find out their ideal green business partners.
